title: Inability to queue?
body: I have never been super big into league, but I have tried to get into it multiple times. Since I downloaded league, when I play with friends the queue pops for them but it doesn't for me, it just says reconnecting. I don't have problems for any other games. When solo queueing my time goes to around 6 minutes then just stops searching. Sometimes I can accept the queues, but most times I can't. Any ideas?

replies.body:
It really sounds like your network is having some weird problems with our matchmaking servers, or possibly that your client isn't showing the queue pop from some kind of display hardware/software issue. 

First up, I'd like to have you try adjusting your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you're getting a solid connection with *our* servers. Just because other games or websites load just fine doesn't mean you're getting a good signal to us. 

Next, make sure your drivers are updated and try turning on low-spec mode in the client options. That will disable some of the animations on the client and should make it easier to navigate.

EDIT: It'd also be worth the time to try disabling your firewalls/antivirus when queueing. Sometimes certain things like that can block League's access to our servers from not having the right exceptions set up.
Still having the issue. Just had to dodge 4 games due to no queue pop

I found something that helps but is quite annoying. It seems like I get to accept matches more often when I stay in the client during the timer rather than tabbing out to do other things while waiting. It wasn't a complete fix, but it does let me join more games. I'll give your suggestions a test as well, thank you!

I can message people at all times, I can do everything on the client, but my queues almost never pop. I never get the option to accept a match. I've been trying for the past hour and I can't get into a game.
